title: Haptic Systems Integration Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: Key responsibilities for this role include providing critical on-site support for factory builds during early prototype and engineering build phases of various Apple programs leading up to Mass Production. This requires you to be able to dig deep into any problems that may arise during a factory build and think critically to help resolve them in a fast paced, data driven environment.
key_qualifications: Solid fundamentals in both analog and digital circuits and comfortable with tackling new challenges with critical thinking and problem solving skills. Knowledge and experience in mechatronics and electromagnetism preferred. Any background in haptics, acoustics, or vibrations would be advantageous...
education_experience: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering + 3 years of industry experience
